  • Constructor Details

    • orderItem

      public orderItem()
      Default constructor for orderItem, gives all fields default values itemSize is set to 20, the smallest size

    • orderItem

      public orderItem​(int id, int orderId, int itemNumberInOrder, java.lang.String itemName, int itemAmount, int itemSize)
      Parametrized constructor for an orderItem
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the item on the order ticket
      orderId - the orderId this item is a part of
      itemNumberInOrder - the index of this item in the order ticket
      itemName - the name of the item
      itemAmount - the number of this specific item in the order ticket
      itemSize - the size of the item (one of our 3 integer sizes in oz)
